author: Nick Nairn
method: Place all the spices into a mortar and pestle and pound together. Heat the oil in a pan over a low heat and fry the spices for one minute. Add the tomatoes and sugar and simmer for 5-6 minutes. Stir in the fresh coriander. To serve, spread the chutney over the naan bread.
